location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Hinde Pelly, Deputy Paymaster General at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from John Hinde Pelly, Deputy Paymaster General at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, forwarding a list of contingent bills from Bushire Residency passed by the Military Auditor General in Bombay on the same day.
